activities: See Adaptec's privacy policy for details on online processing of personal information received from the EU (web address listed below). recoursemech: Consumer or Adaptec employee complaints will generally be escalated internally to the Adaptec corporate legal department which will consult with management on appropriate response or action depending on the facts at issue.  In the event that Adaptec is unable to resolve a complaint to the consumer or employee's satisfaction, Adaptec will direct the employee or consumer to contact local authoritative bodies (including the European Data Protection Authorities).
